name: flan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK a case of pastry or cake without a top, containing fruit or something savoury (= not sweet) such as cheese: a cheese and onion flan a pear flan a flan dish
Eising/Photodisc/GettyImages
US a sweet, soft food made from milk, eggs, and sugar
Juanmonino/E+/GettyImages
